title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Val Poschiavo, Switzerland
content:
Photo submitted by Misch, “I live in St. Moritz where we still have Snow and riding is not possible…So we head south, 40minute drive and are in Val Poschiavo, a small Valley with a lot of good riding!!!” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Val Poschiavo, Switzerland appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
